author: Juan Jose Orellano Peñalver
description: Savoury and spicy, this is an aperitivo cocktail, that is unless you need a chili-spiced kick-start to your day over breakfast – in which case perhaps rename this Wakey Wakey. Its enlivening spice has a curry-like appeal that makes this cocktail difficult to stop sipping on.
name: Bonsai
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Umeshu plum sake/ Japanese plum wine

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
